mapper.insert: insert into consumer_member (c_passwd, c_name, c_email, c_phonenum) values (#{c_passwd}, #{c_name}, #{c_email}, #{c_phonenum})

insert into farm_member (f_passwd, f_email, f_phonenum, f_name, f_RRN, f_BRN, f_zipcode, f_location, f_farm_name, f_num, f_explanation, f_major_crop, f_profile_img, f_img, f_bank, f_bank_name, f_bank_num, f_bank_img) values (#{f_passwd}, #{f_email}, #{f_phonenum}, #{f_name}, #{f_RRN}, #{f_BRN}, #{f_zipcode}, #{f_location}, #{f_farm_name}, #{f_num}, #{f_explanation}, #{f_major_crop}, #{f_profile_img}, #{f_img}, #{f_bank}, #{f_bank_name}, #{f_bank_num}, #{f_bank_img})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM consumer_member WHERE c_email = #{email} AND c_passwd = #{password}
SELECT * FROM farm_member WHERE f_email = #{email} AND f_passwd = #{password}
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM consumer_member CROSS JOIN farm_member WHERE c_email = #{email} OR f_email = #{email})
